Example_Sentence: The team accomplished all project goals ahead of schedule.
Example_Translation: 팀은 모든 프로젝트 목표를 일정보다 앞서 달성했다.

Example_Sentence: Please ensure all data entries are accurate before submission.
Example_Translation: 제출 전에 모든 데이터 입력이 정확한지 확인하세요.

Example_Sentence: We need additional staff to handle the increased workload.
Example_Translation: 증가한 업무량을 처리하기 위해 추가 직원이 필요합니다.

Example_Sentence: The budget is adequate for our current needs.
Please adjust your schedule to attend the meeting.
